title: Veigar's Bad Santa Skin - Problem I wish Riot can fix.
body:
If you have played with this (AMAZING) skin, then you may have noticed that the health bar actually blocks part of his model and a lot of his recalling animation. I only hope that riot can fix this tiny problem, because it will make me so happy, and I will be grateful, even if it is such a small problem.
{{champion:45}} =LIFE
Thanks
NoNamerz

replies.body:
Hey NoNamerz14,

Oh! You're right, the health bar is a bit low on this skin. We'll raise it up a bit. :]
{{champion:45}}  Bit low? Is that a short joke???
